mdRecord.dcterms:description: This is a black and white photograph of two men and a woman at the beach. The handwritten notes on the back read, "Via A P / At City after Ed T. graduating Dartmouth 1947" with a separate note in a different hand: "Correction 1952." The accompanying notes identify the subjects as Walter Wood, Carrie Wood, and Clarence M. Wood.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Clarence M. Wood, Carrie Wood, and Walter Wood at the Beach (photograph)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: New Jersey -- Atlantic City
Wood, Clarence M. (Clarence Mosby)
Wood, Carrie
Wood, Walter
